org.csc.phynixx.connection
Interface IPhynixxManagedConnectionListener<C extends IPhynixxConnection>

Type Parameters:
C - Typ of the connection
All Known Subinterfaces:
IPhynixxLoggerSystemStrategy<C>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Dev0Strategy, LoggerPerTransactionStrategy, PhynixxManagedConnectionFactory, PhynixxManagedConnectionListenerAdapter, PooledPhynixxManagedConnectionFactory
public interface IPhynixxManagedConnectionListener<C extends IPhynixxConnection>

lifecycle listener of an Connection

connectionReleased

void connectionReleased(IManagedConnectionEvent<C> event)
called after the connection is close. A connection is released when is not any longer bound to a transactional context but should be reused ICloseable.isClosed() is true

Parameters:
event - current connection
